Package client

Class ChatClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • ocsf.client.AbstractClient
      • client.ChatClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class ChatClient
extends ocsf.client.AbstractClient
    The ChatClient class represents a client that communicates with the server. It extends the AbstractClient class from the ocsf library.

      • ChatClient

        public ChatClient​(java.lang.String host,
                  int port,
                  ChatIF clientUI)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs an instance of the chat client.
        Parameters:
        host - The server to connect to.
        port - The port number to connect on.
        clientUI - The interface type variable.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs while opening the connection.
